_comments: add a new card = add:true, newValues {}
select cards starting with a value = where: type~='Snow'
get card directly from Gatherer = where: gatherer='Serra Angel'

exceptions._comment: The above line turns this one rare Snow Land into common so this switches it back

Delete all cards outside of the main set -- Basic lands are #504-511. Cards with alternate card frames have another collector number than the original version.[9] The two borderless planeswalkers are #512 and #513, foil-etched cards are numbered #514-614 and extended artwork cards are numbered #615-716. Both regular and foil versions of the borderless and extended art cards may be found in the Collector Boosters (there are no variants for the foil-etched cards). The cards with numbers #717-720 do not exist; these were going to be extended-art versions of the new Commander deck cards, but they were cut from the set (at too late a point for renumbering to occur).[10] The Buy-a-Box is #721 and the prerelease promo is #722
Delete Basic Snow Land, imported elsewhere
Consider everything left the main set.
